title: Enhancing Software Development Practical Skills: Language Education Design Using Interdisciplinary Pedagogy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: They can explain the core principles of interdisciplinary pedagogy: integration, connectivity, and goal setting.
They can analyze and present at least three points of integration between language subjects and other disciplines (society, science, arts).
When designing specific lessons, they can create activity plans incorporating interdisciplinary elements and incorporate peer feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
